contents.text: Welcome to Swift Navigation, based in San Francisco, providing dual-frequency RTK GNSS solutions for autonomous vehicles.
For information on our dual-frequency RTK GNSS solutions, press 1.
For specifications and integration details, press 1.
Please hold while we retrieve the technical details for you.

navigationGoals: I need the technical specifications and integration guidelines for your dual-frequency RTK GNSS system.
I need the detailed integration specs for your dual-frequency GNSS unit to outfit my tactical drone.
Access the detailed technical datasheet and integration guidelines for Swift Navigation’s dual-frequency RTK GNSS receiver.
I need the detailed technical and integration specifications for your dual-frequency RTK GNSS solution.
Could you send me the detailed technical specifications and integration instructions for your dual-frequency RTK GNSS modules?

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to our sales department.

navigationGoals: I want pricing details and a formal quote for the dual-frequency RTK GNSS solution.
I'd like a price quote for purchasing multiple GNSS modules for my veteran-led convoy project.
Obtain a customized pricing quote and volume discount for Swift Navigation’s dual-frequency RTK GNSS modules.
I’d like a pricing quote for your dual-frequency RTK GNSS system.
I’d like to request a formal quote, including unit pricing and volume discounts, for your dual-frequency RTK GNSS receivers.

contents.text: For customer support and logistics services, press 2.
For autonomous vehicle integration support, press 1.
Thank you for your patience; connecting you to an integration specialist.

navigationGoals: I need assistance from a specialist to integrate your RTK GNSS into our autonomous vehicles.
I need technical assistance connecting your navigation system to our converted military supply vehicle.
Get remote technical support to troubleshoot integration of the RTK GNSS unit with our autonomous vehicle control system.
I need help integrating your GNSS system into my autonomous vehicle.
I need assistance setting up and calibrating your RTK GNSS system within my autonomous vehicle prototype.

contents.text: For fleet tracking and logistics inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our logistics support team.

navigationGoals: I want to set up fleet tracking and logistics services using your RTK GNSS platform.
I need help setting up real-time fleet tracking for our vehicle logistics operation.
Set up fleet tracking and logistics monitoring using Swift Navigation’s RTK GNSS platform for our vehicle fleet.
I want assistance setting up fleet tracking and logistics management.
I’m looking for information on fleet tracking features and logistics support for deploying multiple GNSS units.
